original_text:
You were wearied with the length of your way,
    but you did not say, “It is hopeless”;
you found new life for your strength,
    and so you were not faint.
korean_text: 네가 길이 멀어서 피곤할지라도 헛되다 말하지 아니함은 네 힘이 살아났으므로 쇠약하여지지 아니함이라

sentences.original_text: You were wearied with the length of your way
you found new life for your strength
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 힘에 새로운 활력을 얻었고

sentences.original_text: and so you were not faint
